data.enText: to repair and paint an old building, a piece of furniture, etc. so that it is in good condition again
There will be extensive renovations to the hospital.
data.chText: 这所医院将进行大规模的翻修。

word_means: 使恢复活力，使振作精神
simple_means.memory_skill: re- 重新 + nov- 新的 + -ate 做,造成

means: 使恢复活力，使振作精神

tr: give new life or energy to
example: A hot soup will revive me
My wife wants us to renovate

tr: restore to a previous or better condition
example: They renovated the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel

example.ex: The couple spent thousands renovating the house...
example.tran: 这对夫妇花了几千元来翻新房子。

example.ex: She lives in a large, renovated farmhouse.
example.tran: 她住在一个宽敞的翻新过的农舍里。

value.def: If someone renovates an old building, they repair and improve it and get it back into good condition.

example.ex: ...a property which will need extensive renovation.
example.tran: 需要进行大规模整修的房产
